document.full_text: record holder tyson gay ran the year's fastest 100 meters when he clocked 9.79 seconds in a tune-up meeting at clermont, florida on saturday.
document.title: gay runs year's fastest 100 meters in tune-up meeting
lines_and_colors: record holder tyson gay ran the year's fastest 100 meters when he clocked 9.79 seconds in a tune-up meeting at clermont, florida on saturday.
